TextLibrary.Text: We have no time to waste. We must find this ship before they complete it.
We have no time to waste. We must find this ship before they complete it.
We need to visit those planets again in Gorgon, Hades, Gehenna and Typhon. This time we can use the heart.
We need to visit those planets again in Gorgon, Hades, Gehenna and Typhon. This time we can use the heart.
